explains: n. （马或狮子的）鬃毛；浓密的头发
【名】 （Mane）（法、塞、几、冈、意、安哥、几比）马内（人名）；（Mane）（日）真根（人名）

sentences.en: The horse's mane can be washed at the same time as his body.
sentences.cn: 马的鬃毛可以随其身体一起刷洗。

sentences.en: For some time he clung to the mane, that he might recover himself.
sentences.cn: 有一段时间，他紧紧抓住鬃毛，好让自己恢复过来。
